DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study was to determine the effect of the psychiatric nursing approach based on the Tidal Model on coping and self-esteem in people with alcohol dependency.
DOC.brief_title: Tidal Model's Effect on Coping and Self-Esteem
DOC.criteria: People with alcohol dependency were included in the study who were between 30 and 50 years of age who were admitted for treatment to the Alcohol and Substance Addiction Treatment clinic. People with alcohol dependency who were severely depressed with a Beck Depression score of 41 or more and those with severe anxiety(a Beck Anxiety score of 26 or more) were not included in the study.
